item.title: Special: DeepMind, Navier–Stokes, and the Millennium Problem
item.description: How AI-assisted mathematics is exploring one of the hardest open problems in fluid dynamics.
item.itunes:author: Prompt Science
item.itunes:summary: DeepMind, Navier–Stokes, and how AI is helping mathematicians explore the Millennium Prize Problem.
